column3:
"What's up! How have you been recently? "
"I'm doing pretty good other than these braces hurting my mouth. How about you?"

"Aw I'm sorry to hear that, my cousin had to wear braces for 3 years and she hated it. What's weird is that her twin didn't need any."
"That's weird. Do twins run in your family? Are you a twin?"

"Well, there has only been one set of twins in my family, and I'm hoping when I have children it will just be one kid at a time. "
"the twins would definitely keep you on your toes"

"Oh for sure! If I had twin boys I would probably name one Lex and the other Clark, my love of Superman will never die lol"
"My mom loves Superman, we used to watch the movies together all the time."

"Same! He was my favorite superhero as a kid. He's still my favorite today, but Batman is a close second. "
"Batman is pretty darn sweet. The Dark Knight made me love him even more."

"Oh for sure. The Dark Knight movies were my favorite, but the Tim Burton Batman movies will always have a special place in my heart. "
"I love Tim Burton movies! "
column4:
سلام! اخیرا چطور بودی؟

اوه متاسفم که اینو شنیدم، پسر خاله‌ام باید سه سال از براکت استفاده کنه و اصلا دوست نداشت. عجیبه که برادر دوقلویش اصلا نیازی به براکت نداشت.

خب، تنها یک جفت دوقلو در خانواده من بوده است، و من امیدوارم که وقتی کودکان داشته باشم، فقط یک کودک در هر زمان باشد.

"آره قطعا! اگر دو پسر دوقلو داشته باشم، احتمالا یکی را لکس و دیگری را کلارک می‌نامیدم، عشق من به سوپرمن هرگز نمی‌میرد هاها"

همینطور! اون قهرمان مورد علاقه من بود وقتی کودک بودم. امروز هم هنوز مورد علاقه منه، اما بتمن در رتبه دوم قرار داره.

بله، قطعا. فیلم‌های شوالیه تاریک مورد علاقه من بودند، اما فیلم‌های بتمن تیم برتون همیشه جای ویژه‌ای در قلب من خواهند داشت.

'Awesome! Where do you buy your supplies for those hobbies?'

'that is very convenient, I also like to shop online. Are you married or dating?'

"I'm casually seeing someone. Not sure if it'll go anywhere. You"
'I have a family. I spend a lot of time driving the kids to soccer and baseball practice'

'Do you enjoy that?' 
'Yes, there is a lot of joy in providing for my kids. It is difficult, but I enjoy my time with them. Where are you employed?'

'I am a general manager at a casino'
'Wow! That is awesome. I love playing blackjack. Do you enjoy your work? '

'I do! It can be very interesting sometimes. '

column3:
Yes I wonder what causes people to become like that? It alienates so many people from them.
I think that it's a mental health condition. Personally if I have too much stuff I give the extra to charity.

My Grandmother was like this and would get anxious whenever someone would move her stuff.
Perhaps she had old memories surrounding her possessions that she did not wish to get rid of.

Oh she would collect new things. Even go through stuff people put on the side of the road.
She probably hated to see anything thrown out. Personally I love coupons.

Me too. It's such a rush when you cut all those coupons. Almost feels like real money!
It's definitely a fun hobby to have and saves money too.

Do you have kids? I imagine someone would save a lot of money couponing with kids.
No I don't - does not stop me from liking couponing tho!

Haha. Me neither. I keep a little folder of them when I go to the store. Cashiers probably look at me like I'm crazy.
I know the people behind in the queue can get a bit irritable.

مادربزرگ من اینطور بود و هرگاه کسی اقلامش را جابجا می‌کرد، نگران می‌شد.

It was pretty funny, actually. She always treated it like a game, and she definitely won that night.

I miss her so much... What kind of dog do you have?

'I have 2 dogs and a cat. My cat always gets on my tv when I play halo 3.' 
'Nice to hear that.I too have a dog at home. The breed is lab.'

'Labs are great dogs. Mine are golden retreivers.' 
'Working with a vet has helped me to understand and take care of my dog very much. '

'That sounds like a cool job. I hope to be a video game developer one day.' 
"That's great. I think you have a great creative mind Am I right?"

'I like to think so. So do you have any other pets?' 
"I would love to have one more dog as companion to my lab. He will enjoy more. Let's see."

'Yeah, dogs are happier when they have a furry friend.' 
'Yes I understand that. But space is a constraint in my home. My husband is a lawyer. His books occupy a lot of space.'

"I bet! I'm not a lawyer but books overrun my house too." 
"That's great. Reading is something I too enjoy a lot. It refreshes you mind like anything. What kind of books do you read?"

Maybe in the future.

How many do you want to have? and you can ask me questions too
Probably two, i feel more could be overwhelming. What about you?

I think 2 is a perfect number. And if I have kids I will make sure to make them barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs
That sounds yummy. What are pizza puffs, like pizza rolls?

Yes, it's like pizza on a roll, but not like hot pockets because the pizza part is on top of the bread rather than inside. What is your favorite food?
Any kind of ice cream. What's your favorite flavor?

Well I like Mint Chocolate chip myself, but I am also fond of coffee ice cream. Do you enjoy coffee?
I really dont like coffee, I much prefer tea

Oh tea is good. And good for you! I also take some when I'm feeling ill
I usually drink a cup every morning, but its too hot right now with a busted AC

I understand that. It was pretty hot here but now it's getting cooler. I love the fall weather
I love the fall, but we arent getting the weather here.

Hawaii, its pretty hot

I have always wanted to visit Hawaii! maybe some day I will. It was very nice chatting with you
Nice talking to you as well! Have a good day

"Oh wow, that's crazy! I bet that's why my grandmother's house was always so clean in Chicago!"

"Hahah! Yeah that can definitely be a reason why."
"We played a gig at a bar once and they only had Pepsi, I was so mad I broke my drum set."

"No way! LOL."
"Yes! I have a slight anger problem but I'm learning ways to stay calm now."

"Yeah I was going to say, you may have anger issues lol. As long as you are trying, though!"
"My only trigger now is if someone tries to give me Sprite. I hate Sprite."

"Oh my gosh! Hahaha!"
"So other than Coke, what's your favorite drink?"

"Well, I'd have to say water. Plain and basic water!"
"I do love me some water!"

"I'm not the biggest fan, but my dad loves it. I sit and watch it with him while eating our favorite food, jello."
"Jello is great! I used to make jello jigglers for Christmas with my Grandma."

"Oohh I've been looking for new things to make with jello. Will you teach me to make them?"
"Sure! Do you like jello shots? Those are fun to eat."

"I love those! It's my favorite thing to have at parties!"
"I've been to quite a few awesome college parties with jello shots in my college career lol"

"Lol same! It's a staple of college life lol"
"I'll definitely miss it once I graduate!"

I found that eating foods I don't like helps too, I can't stand pickles so I eat a lot of those. It helps me not overindulge.

Eating foods you don't like haha! They are called fruits & veggies!

Yes! Broccoli is amazing, although I always forget how to spell it.

That would be great! Where would you like to meet for lunch? somewhere that serves tradition style cuisine for that region
Ok...Let's plan on it then. We can catch up on everything else that is positive in our lives. that sounds awesome, cant wait to see you.
I know, it's been way too long since we've enjoyed lunch together. When are you leaving on your trip? im not entirely sure, but probably 2 weeks from now. i have some unfinished business i need to wrap up before i leave.
Got cha! How long do you plan on being gone? maybe two month, i want to see everything i possibly can in that region.
Yeah, you'll need a few months. I know when I went to Cairo, Egypt, I stayed for three months. you went to egypt, thats so cool. thats the next place i want to travel to , to see the great pyramids of gira.

"I know, I do feel very guilty about it. But there's a basketball game starting I want to watch. "
"Well give it back :) Stealing is not right"

"Maybe after the game. And then I need to go work out "
"i know . now i feel guilty"

"Do you not work out? I do so every day"
"yeah . but not today . i like the gym"

"I love the gym .. I also love swimming and jogging. "
"Main reason I started going to the gym was to get a break lol"

"What did you need a break from? "
"I guess a bad relationship and my dog passing away I've just needed some time to myself."

"I am very sorry about that  - my dog is elderly and I dread her passing. "
"Oh god. I'm so sad for you. Maybe a walk in the park will make you feel better. It always does for me."

column3:
Mummies were a big fad in England historically.
Mummies of humans and other animals have been found on every continent. So cool when you think about it!

I personally don't see the point in preserving corpses but I think the practices are neat!
I feel the same, but I guess it does provide something interesting for future civilizations to uncover and learn about the past. 

That's true! Sometimes I wonder how much we misunderstand their intentions, though.
Definitely. The world is an extremely complex thing, and I don't know if we'll ever fully understand it.

It is! Makes me wonder how incomprehensible an alien civilization would be since we have so much trouble understanding the past of our own.
That's a really good point. Perhaps that's why he haven't made contact with an alien species. 

I wonder what will happen if we do.
Hopefully it's a peaceful connection! I'm hoping it'll be like humans and dogs - we can't communicate but we get along just fine.

That would be ideal. I don't see the need for conflict.
I agree. Peace would be great. It would be great to have another planet to have holidays on!

"I haven't tried it yet but I'm going to try it since I'm having trouble finding a real job." 
"nice, let me know how everything turned out. i might try it myself"

"I definitely will! Other than that, my social life has been better than I expected it to be lately"
"how is that. what made your social life better"

"I think it's been due to me getting out looking for jobs. I've met a lot of interesting people."
"cool...networking and meeting new people help out more  than you realize"

"It really does. So how have things been going for you lately?"
"i have to look for another job myself . the physical therapist i work for is to demanding"

"I know that feeling. My former boss was a pain too. Always micromanaging."
"yeah, you get it. we should be our own bosses and quit the rat race."

"Exactly! I plan on doing that one day"
"cool .. maybe we can go into business together. you have any ideas"

column3:
"I've been there multiple times. Any other places?"
"You should definitely visit Japan! There is so much cool culture there and the landscape is beautiful."

"Honestly I would prefer Europe. Have you ever been in Japan?"
"I have not been to Japan but I want to so much. I would love to visit Europe too. I want to see the Sistine Chapel"

"Maybe we can go together. When do you expect to be available?"
"I should be available after the holidays. Maybe some time in January. Does that work for you?"

"That's fantastic. Here is a deal: I pay for the airfare, you pay for the hotel. "
"I like that idea. I'll try to make sure I find us some place very comfortable with a great breakfast!"

"Do we need visas to cross the border?"
"I think there are some places that do require a Visa. I will look into it before we make our final plans"

"OK, that's very important. Also do not forget to renew your passport."
"Oh yeah, I almost forgot about that! I have never actually had to get a passport before."

"Very well. This trip should help to my brother to stay alone and think about his life."
"I think it will bring you and your brother closer together and that's a great thing!"

"He has been having a lot of problems lately. Our parents were not able to help."
"Well at least this vacation can be of some help to you. I can't wait! Thanks for the chat."

The problem is that lately my eyes started to hurt.
have you ever had to wear glasses or contacts?

Both, but I think lots of reading affects my eyes. I am starting to consider audio books. Any ideas?
i prefer biographies, but i have a long commute so i have lots of time to listen. do you prefer fiction or non-fiction?

Fiction, however historic novels are my favorite. Who is your favorite writer?
probably david mccullough. i don't think he writes any fiction though.

I admire Fyodor Dostoevsky. When I read his novels I realized that I was in a darkness and suddenly it became bright.
can you please tell me what his philosophy is and how it affect your life ?

He thought that the modern day civilization was too degraded and lost faith in God. He was interested in religion.
Good for you. Religion can be a source of hope and optimism for many people in times of distress.

Yes, you got it right.
Troubling times do make us extra vulnerable.

"I'm really into britney spears lately."
"Taylor swift is actually amazing, she is my guilty pleasure."

"She's a really good singer songwriter i agree. Do you have a favourite album?"
"Not really, I have listened to all of her albums though, especially 25 which was my favorite."

"I like her more country stuff. It's nice to listen too on walks outside."
"i completely agree , bouncing around alot as a kid really opened my eyes to different music ."

"Were you an energetic child?"
"Not Really now, because I am at home, and my friends are all at school, and no one from my home hits me up that much."

"Ahhh damn. that must be rough. Maybe a long walk this weekend could help?"
"Like that song by Mariah Carey, I don't want to cry, lol. It's probably just from being tired."

"Do you need a big hug? Maybe blast some britney spears?"
"I would love a big hug, mostly from Taylor Swift"

من اخیراً خیلی به بریتنی اسپیرز علاقه‌مند شده‌ام.

او خواننده و ترانه‌سرای خیلی خوبیه، با این حرف موافقم. آیا آلبوم مورد علاقه‌ای داری؟

من بیشتر از موسیقی کشوری او خوشم می آید. خوش است که در هنگام پیاده روی در خارج گوش داد.

آیا شما یک کودک پرانرژی بودید؟

اه، خدا نکنه. این بیشتر باید سخت باشه. شاید یک پیاده‌روی طولانی این آخر هفته کمک کنه؟

column5:
تیلور سوئیفت واقعا شگفت‌انگیزه، او لذت مخفی منه.

واقعاً نه، اما همه‌ی آلبوم‌های او را گوش داده‌ام، به ویژه آلبوم 25 که مورد علاقه‌ام بود.

من کاملاً موافقم، پرشیدن و پرتابیدن زیادی هنگام کودکی واقعا چشمان من را به موسیقی‌های مختلف باز کرد.

واقعاً الان نه، چون من در خانه هستم و دوستانم همه در مدرسه هستند و هیچ کس از خانه من زیاد با من تماس نمی‌گیرد.

مثل آن آهنگ مارایا کری، من نمی‌خواهم گریه کنم، ههه. احتمالا فقط از خستگی است.

من عاشق یک آغوش بزرگ هستم، بیشتر از همه از تیلور اسویفت.

column3:
'I think I am frustrated!'
'I have been there before. Sometimes you just need to relax!'

'I have been trying to work out but I cant seem to loose any weight'
'You can do it! Just simply restrict your carbohydrate consumption and it will fall off!'

'I have tried that, I am a mother and I breastfeed my baby, so I tend to eat a lot'
'My wife breast fed the baby and she needed to eat all the time!'

'it is so hard when you are breastfeeding, but I cant help but worry because my doctor told me I am overweight '
'i know what you mean . do you take medication for it ? it helps! You could lose fast'

'what kind of medication?'
"i've heard of allegra but that is all i know. Makes me feel so good!"

'does it have any side effects?'
'No, the only cure is to avoid the foods that make you upset. I like the all natural feeling.'

column3:
I like to knit and crochet. 
I have never tried knitting but I want to learn. Is it hard to do?

Not really. I don't notice that I've made a mistake and have to undo a whole bunch. So thats annoying.
What is the biggest project you have worked on with your knitting?

Just a few baby blankets. I'm not really that good yet. What are your hobbies?
I like to make jewelry! I sell a lot of it and it's a ton of fun for me.

Thats awesome! I always want to start making jewelry but I have so many other projects. You probably know how it is, lol
I certainly do. There's always something else that wants to take your time and attention away from hobbies.

Or other hobbies that take attention away. What do you do for work?
I work as a secretary. It isn't the most glamorous job in the world, but it pays the bills!

I clean aquariums and manage a hotel, also not glamorous. 
I think cleaning aquariums sounds like a cool job. I love looking at all the colorful fish.

Me too! I have 14 aquariums in my house. It was nice talking to you, have a good night!
It was great talking to you as well!

"What's your grandma like? Mine is crazy but so fun!"

"She's really nice and I love her. We also have a pet called Toto! Do you have any pets?"
"No, but that would be cool! Maybe I should start by pet sitting one. My grandma loves dogs."

"Do you like dogs?"
"I have 2 and I love them to death. Rocky and Ricky. You?"

"Yeah, One called Toto. How old are your pets?"
"12 and 14. They are getting so old, you?"

"I'm in LA. What about you"
"I am from Chicago, Illinois. It is starting to get very chilly here!"

"Nice. I love Christmas. What's your favorite time of the year"
"I think I love Christmas the most too. My favorite Christmas tradition is making hot cocoa and singing Christmas carols with my family."

"I love the exchange of gifts. It shows love"
"I love exchanging gifts too. What kind of present are you hoping for this year?"

"I don't really care. It's the thought that matters"
"Yes that is true. It's also nice to spend time with the people that you love."

"I always look forward to seeing my family members. I have not seen some all year"
"Do you live far away from your family?"

"Yes I live miles away. What about you"
"My family lives only 20 minutes away from me. I get to see them quite often"

Oh my, are you able to read? 
yes I can read I just can't hear.

OK, well does it bother you that you are deaf?
No, I dosen't bother me.  I'm usually more annoyed than anything.

I see. Yeah I can imagine how annoying it can be.
Yeah it makes things difficult sometimes, like when people want to go to a concert and such.

Right, at least you don't have the loud music blasting in your ears haha.
Hahaha! You're right! I do like to read any chance I get so I can visualize things going on.

Reading is a great hobby to have! That is awesome to hear.
Yes it is one of my favorite activities. You can share a lot of information and ideas that way.

'I did too when I was younger. Do you play basketball'
"I did in college, now I just play the occasional casual game with friends. My knees aren't what they used to be, haha. Do you play any sports?"
'I ran track when I was in high school '
"That's great exercise. Are you a fan of sports?"
"Yes I'm a fan of sports more football than basketball"
'Ah cool, who is your favorite team?'
'My favorite team is the Giants '
'Nice! Do you attend many games?'
'No just watch on the television '
"It's nicer at home I reckon. no crowds to deal with."

column3:
Actually I have! In the last few months I got a new job as a flight attendant and I have been to some seriously cool place!
"That is pretty sweet! What is your favorite country you've been to so far?"

I really love Ireland. It's sooo green (my favorite color) and the people there are wonderful. Plus the architecture is unparalleled.
"I would love to go to Ireland. Sounds like a great opportunity! Is it difficult to become a flight attendant?"

It's not terribly hard. I had to go through some schooling for it and then on the job training, but it was worth it. What do you do?
"Well I am 15 so I don't have a job just yet. But I try to do dog sitting for people in my spare time. I absolutely love animals."

You have a lot of time to figure it out. Animals are always drawn to me. I'd love a dog but I'm gone all the time.
"Animals have to have a lot of love and attention so it's probably good you don't have one. But you can always visit a petting zoo."

That's true. I try to go to major zoos when I'm in a new city but I don't always have time.
"Yes, aquariums too! if you ever come through Atlanta you have to visit the Georgia aquarium. They have 4 huge whale sharks!"

That would be fun! I've never been there before. I did just go to the one in New Orleans though. It was amazing!
"I will have to try to visit that one too. Did they have a lot of tropical fish? I enjoy fish of many different colors."

They had a bunch but I'm from the Midwest and I thought it was odd they had deer at the zoo too.
"Oh that is interesting. I used to live in Colorado and you would see deer in passing all the time. In any case, it was lovely talking with you!"
column4:
در واقع من دارم! در چند ماه گذشته شغل جدیدی به عنوان خدمه هواپیما گرفتم و به برخی از مکان‌های واقعاً جالب رفته‌ام!

من واقعا عاشق ایرلند هستم. اون خیلی سبزه (رنگ مورد علاقه من) و مردمش عالی هستند. علاوه بر این، معماری اون بی نظیره.

این خیلی سخت نیست. من برای آن باید به مدرسه بروم و سپس آموزش در محل کار ببینم، اما ارزشش بود. شما چه کاری انجام می‌دهید؟

شما زمان زیادی برای حل این موضوع دارید. حیوانات همیشه به من جذب می‌شوند. من عاشق یک سگ هستم اما همیشه خارج از خانه هستم.

این درست است. من سعی می کنم که وقتی در یک شهر جدید هستم به بزرگترین باغ‌وحش‌ها بروم، اما همیشه وقت ندارم.

این خیلی جالب خواهد بود! من هرگز قبلاً اونجا نبوده‌ام. اما تازه به یکی در نیواورلئان رفتم. واقعاً شگفت‌انگیز بود!

آن‌ها یک گروه داشتند اما من از منطقه میانه غرب آمریکا هستم و فکر کردم عجیب است که آن‌ها هم گوزن‌ها را در باغ وحش داشتند.

این جالب است. من قبلاً در کلرادو زندگی می‌کردم و اغلب می‌توانستید گوزن‌ها را در گذر مشاهده کنید. به هر حال، خوشحالم که با شما صحبت کردم!

column3:
Running helps you relax huh?
Yeah it lets me think about things. I think it's because I grew up in an athletic family. My brother is in the army now.

Oh neat, where is he stationed at? My grandfather was in the air force, stationed in Kentucky.
Right now he's not overseas. He did do 5 tours in Iraq though. He's home. His wife just had a baby.

Wow! Congratulations! I just got engaged to my high school sweetheart.
Awwww that's awesome. Congratulations! Do you have a date set?

Right now we're planning for some time in November.
That's coming up so fast. I bet you are so excited! Where is the wedding at? People used to do them on our farm growing up.

We're looking at a couple places back in Kentucky. We're originally from there.
Kentucky is beautiful. There's a lot of rolling green hills and open land. I'm sure you will find the perfect spot!

I hope so. It will probably be somewhere around Knoxville, where my parents live.
I'm not sure I've ever been there, but maybe someday. Right now I live in the middle of the country about 45 minutes from a town or store.

اوه، خوبه، او کجا مستقر است؟ پدربزرگ من در نیروی هوایی بود، در کنتاکی مستقر بود.

در حال حاضر ما برنامه‌ریزی برای یک زمان در ماه نوامبر داریم.

ما به چند مکان در کنتاکی نگاه می‌کنیم. ما اصلاً از آنجا هستیم.

امیدوارم. احتمالاً در نزدیکی ناحیه ناکسویل خواهد بود، جایی که والدینم زندگی می‌کنند.

در حال حاضر او خارج از کشور نیست. او البته پنج تور در عراق داشت. او در خانه است. همسرش به تازگی نوزادی به دنیا آورده است.

Do you believe they are real? "well most people do not believe mermaids are real, am one of those people"
I see I see. Yeah I feel as if there would be more news stories on mermaids if they were actually real. "what do you do for fun?"
I exercise, play basketball, lift weights. What about you? "I sleep most of the time I am off, I also listen to music"
What is your favorite type of music? I love music! "I also love Jazz, I also like country music and RnB"
Oh, Jazz and RnB are awesome. I like that and pop music, the stuff you hear on the radio. "I also listen to rock music as I drive to work"
Nice! Alternative rock music is cool. "I drive for a whole hour to get to work so I enjoy listening to music"

آیا باور داری که آنها واقعی هستند؟ "خب بیشتر مردم به این باور نیستند که پری دریایی‌ها واقعی هستند، من یکی از آن افراد هستم"

من ورزش می‌کنم، بسکتبال بازی می‌کنم، وزنه می‌زنم. تو چه کارهایی انجام می‌دهی؟ "من بیشتر وقت‌هایی که آزاد هستم خواب می‌خوابم، همچنین موسیقی گوش می‌دهم"

اوه، جاز و آر اند بی فوق العاده هستند. من اینها و موسیقی پاپ، چیزهایی که در رادیو می‌شنوید، دوست دارم. "همچنین موسیقی راک را هنگام رانندگی به محل کار گوش می‌دهم"
column5:
من می‌بینم، من می‌بینم. آره، احساس می‌کنم اگر واقعا مردگان دریایی وجود داشتند، بیشتر داستان‌های خبری درباره آن‌ها وجود داشت. "برای تفریح چه کاری می‌کنی؟"

محبوب ترین نوع موسیقی شما چیست؟ من عاشق موسیقی هستم! "من همچنین جاز را دوست دارم، همچنین موسیقی کانتری و آر اند بی"

خوبه! موسیقی راک جایگزین خیلی باحاله. "یک ساعت رانندگی می‌کنم تا به محل کار برسم، پس از گوش دادن به موسیقی لذت می‌برم"

column3:
Do you play? I participate in competitions sometimes and even placed in some of them.
That's nice, I learned how to play when I was in the high school band.

Oh cool! what instrument did you play in high school?
I played a few, since I went to 16 different schools in 12 years, I was a Navy brat growing up.

Wow. That's a lot. Have you ever thought about joining the Navy?
I have thought about it before but it's not for me, i'd rather kayak on lake in my free time. Do you have a kayak?

I've never been kayaking. I've always wanted to though.
Its wonderful, I try to go to the lake every weekend. What do you like to do on the weekends?

I like to watch movies and hang out with my friends. Sometimes I'll go play soccer.
Thats great, my favorite movie is Top Gun, what's yours?

The Dark Knight. I've always loved superhero movies.
Oh thats awesome, what a great pick! I went to 16 schools in 12 years so I watched a lot of movies, had no friends.

هیچ وقت قایقرانی نکردم. اما همیشه خواستم.

It was the worst
Oh no! Did you have any injuries?
A small cut, but the real injure was my pride
Aww, it happens. When I moved from France to the US last year, I got so excited I ran into wall!
Oh, your from France? Why did you move to the States
My dad got a new job! He's an engineer
Cool what part of the US did you move to?
We moved to New York. It's quite nice here, a bit dirty, though and the trains are slower
I've never been to New York but I can image. What company does your dad work for?
He works at the city's electric power plant. You should definitely come up to NY some time. There's a lot to see
I've never been interested in New York, seems kind of gross to me. But I would love to visit France sometime.
Oh France is beautiful. And the food is even better. I definitely miss it and can't wait to go back

column3:
"I love pita bread with hummus, it's great. What sort of Italian food do you like?"
"I am impartial to pasta. I love parmesan cheese!"
"This might sound silly, but which type do you prefer? My kids all like different sorts."
"I think I like angel hair pasta the best because it is so fine and tasty."
"My daughter loves angel hair the best, my two sons prefer spaghetti though. She's just like me, us ladies prefer daintier things."
"Oh yes! Whenever I have a thicker noodle I feel like I'm about to choke on it."
"Do you like pizza or anything else? Pasta is your favorite?"
"I love pizza! Sometimes I make it myself. Somehow everything is tastier when you make it yourself. And you can make it healthy too"
"I love making my own thin crust white pies, especially with artichoke hearts."
"That sounds so yummy! Do you enjoy coffee? I am a barista so I am quite the coffee connoisseur."
"Oh, yes. Being a mother of three practically requires a loyalty membership card at Starbucks."
"Well you should definitely try the iced caramel macchiato. My absolute favorite! What is your favorite?"
"I just like plain ice coffee, with cream and sugar - maybe some vanilla."
"Sometimes simple is best! Thank you for the chat! It was lovely talking with you."

"Yeah its been tough, but i'll get through it. How has your day been?"
"I'm ok, did some shopping for ingredients for sushi. What's your favorite kind? I'd like to make you some."

"Oh that's okay. I'm actually not a huge fan of fish. I prefer chicken or steak way more."
"Oh, I used to love those, but I don't any meat other than fish these days"

"Shrimp is about all the seafood I eat and calamari of course."
"Shrimp is amazing! Plus, I make a mean cocktail sauce. I haven't had calamari, though"

"oh shrimp and cocktail sauce is the bomb.com. What other kind of food do you make?"
"I love making breakfast foods. Have you had shrimp and grits? It's my family's favorite!"

"I've never tried grits before! I don't eat breakfast too much but I love me some bacon."
"Oooh I miss bacon. A good BLT is always a good pick me up."

"Bacon, hash browns, and sausage are my all time favorite breakfast foods."
"Now that sounds like a good breakfast!"

'I prefer working with acrylic paint over oils.'
'do you have a favorite brand?'
'Whatever is on sale, haha.'
'what do you like to paint with your acrylic?'
'I love painting animals. Do you have any hobbies or passions?'
'Fishing, soccer and computer.'
'cool! Do you have a favourite computer game at the moment?'
'I like fps games, they are so exciting! Do you play any computer games?'
"Nice, I don't mind fps. I'm more of a console gal myself. I'm really into driving games at the moment."
'Cool, I guess painting is like a drawing video game!'
'True! Both relaxing, too.'

I love dogs, I have one.
I have a dog too, she is a good dog. But how many of them aren't, right? What kind of dog is it?

German shepherd, two years old
Did you adopt it or have you had it since it was a puppy?

I adopted it. what do you do for a living?
Right now I work part time for Uber while attending college classes.

that is nice, I am currently looking for a job, I am a trained accountant
That sounds hard. I'm majoring in social studies... but I'm failing some of my classes, like women's studies.

I could try modelling but I am not very tall
I could never do that... this might sound silly, but I'm deathly afraid of making left turns! All my friends tease me and call me Zoolander.

that is very funny. you should try work at it
Nah I think it is an OCD thing, not sure. You could be a model they aren't required to be tall, I think.

I love classical music

tell me about your family
Well, I'm single...my family consists of me and my german shepherd, Ollie.
oh nice, I am married with two girls. I love them very much
Beautiful. Some day I'll have kids, just not yet. I hope you and your family are doing well and have a beautiful holiday!
I also have three dogs and a parrot

column3:
"I read novels, preferably those from the late 1800's or early 1900's"
"I dont think ive read any from those times, which would you recommend? I hope they have ebooks I prefer to read in that format"

"Well, I read the Great Gatsby, and that one is actually great!!!"
"Oh, I did read that one in high school. I had no idea it was so old. Did you know the genre has origins in rome and greece?"

"No, I didn't know about that one! It's difficult to imagine such an ancient civilization doing one of the most popular forms of literature nowadays!"
"Have you ever read any historical romances like Wuthering Heights or Moby-Dick?"

"No, not that ones, but I did ready Romeo and Juliet!"
"I read that too, I used to play runescape and they have a quest in that game with them in it."

"Haha, it's good to know even videogames are implementing literature masterpieces into their development!"
"Yes, unfortunate I guess but I'm still an adult who still gets excited about video games."

"There is nothing wrong with that! I also love video games a lot, especially because I am not particularly excited with the idea of leaving my home!"
"Thats great, ive been playing games since the original nentendo ha. Now I mostly play online"
column4:
من رمان‌ها را می‌خوانم، بهتر است که آن‌هایی که از اواخر قرن نوزدهم یا اوایل قرن بیستم هستند.

خب، من گتسبی بزرگ را خواندم، و واقعا عالی بود!!!

نه، من از اون چیزی که گفتی نمی‌دونستم! سخته که تصور کنم یک تمدن باستانی یکی از محبوب‌ترین اشکال ادبیات امروزی رو انجام می‌داده!

نه، نه آنها نه، اما من رمئو و ژولیت را خواندم!

ههه، خوبه که می‌دونیم حتی بازی‌های ویدیویی هم اثرات ادبی را در توسعه خودشان پیاده می‌کنند!

این چیزی اشتباهی ندارد! من هم عاشق بازی های ویدیویی هستم، به ویژه از آنجا که خیلی هیجان زده از ایده ترک خانه نیستم!
column5:
من فکر نمی‌کنم که هیچ کتابی از آن زمان‌ها خوانده باشم، کدام را پیشنهاد می‌دهید؟ امیدوارم که کتاب‌های الکترونیکی داشته باشند، من ترجیح می‌دهم به آن فرمت بخوانم.

اوه، من اون کتاب رو تو دبیرستان خوندم. اصلا نمی‌دونستم اینقدر قدیمیه. آیا می‌دونستی که اصل این ژانر از روم و یونان می‌آید؟

من هم همین را خواندم، من قبلاً ران‌اسکیپ بازی می‌کردم و آن‌ها یک ماموریت در آن بازی دارند که در آن حضور دارند.

بله، متاسفانه فکر می‌کنم اما هنوز یک بزرگسال هستم که هنوز از بازی‌های ویدیویی هیجان زده می‌شود.

این عالیه، من از زمان نینتندو اصلی بازی می‌کنم. الان بیشتر آنلاین بازی می‌کنم.

column3:
'i think it caught a flu' 
'Oh no, thats terrible. One of my kids had the flu. Did the dog get medicine?'

'not yet, I am waiting on my friends to come over. They are bringing me a medicine for my pet' 
'I hope it helps fast, poor puppy. What breed is he?'

'its beagle' 
'oh my neighbor had a beagle. I always called it a bagel'

'smiles, i really do love the breed' 
'I know and theyre a little fat too which is cute'

'do you have a dog too?' 
'I used to, I plan to again once my kids are a little older'

'tanks for your concern' 
'What is wrong with your dog?'

column3:
I always like to finish of large meals with a pint of ice cold Budweiser.
That sounds pretty amazing right now. On Fridays after work I walk down to a local pub and have a frosty 34 oz mug.

I love going out to the pub; I tend to be a social butterfly so it suits me. What else do you like to do?
I love to travel, explore new cities, and learn about historical places. What do you like?

I love travelling, too. Eating large meals, exploring, sightseeing; it's all great fun. Do you have any favorite locales?
I loved New Orleans, Frankenmuth Michigan, and Ireland. Foodie huh? I love food too.

Wow, sounds like you've been all over. Do you travel for business or pleasure?
Mostly I travel for pleasure though sometimes for work too. Do you get to travel and sight see a lot?

I try to go on trips at least once or twice a year. Usually I am able to afford to; I have a decent job and time off.
Yeah traveling can be expensive. Where do you live? I live in the Midwest in a city so sometimes I need to get out.

I live in the South Atlantic region; Florida, to be more specific.
I haven't really been there much. Is it humid?

It can be pretty brutal in the summertime; but that's what air conditioning is for right?
AC is a Godsend that's for sure.
column4:
من همیشه دوست دارم پس از وعده‌های بزرگ با یک پینت بادوایزر یخ زده پایان دهم.

من دوست دارم به پاب بروم؛ من تمایل دارم که یک پروانه اجتماعی باشم، بنابراین برای من مناسب است. شما چه کارهای دیگری را دوست دارید انجام دهید؟

من هم دوست دارم سفر کنم. خوردن غذاهای بزرگ، کاوش، دیدن جاها؛ همه اینها خیلی جالب است. آیا شما مکان‌های مورد علاقه‌ای دارید؟

'You like whiskey?' 'yes I do, I usually drink a bit every once in a while after work!'
"Doesn't it affect your work?" 'As long as my next shift is more than 12 hours later, it should be fine'
'That is so funny. One day it will mess you up.' 'Lol I hope not, but you who knows maybe one day my body may just mess up'
'It could happen someday' 'Maybe I should just drink on weekends, I think that will be safer'
'Yes. Maintain on weekends' "That's good advice, I think it would be even better if I substitute drinking for a more healthy habit. I also like reading"
"That will help so that you don't mess up your work" 'True, it also makes you a more knowledgeable person, which is always good'

column3:
He stole money after I was boasting about having plenty of clients this week.
"Well that's not very good! Well hopefully you can use this to teach him a lesson and you can both move on positively from this experience!"

I hope so. Anytime I try to talk to him he gets upset and thinks I'm talking to him like one of my clients.
"Well, my Dad was a car salesman and when I was young I used to think like that, maybe try to reason with him?"

I try, but it's so difficult. He has a gambling problem and most of my clients have the same issue.
"Have you tried taking him to some sort of gambling anonymous meetings? Seems like that might work :)"

I need to make him want to go. I wish he'd work with me maybe that would change him.
"My Dad tried to get me to work with him, all it did was add pressure and stress to my life"

I didn't even think of that. I just thought maybe seeing other much older people with the same problem would make him change.
"Yes it can maybe used as baby steps or initial steps to help him get a long with people over time!"

امیدوارم. هر وقت سعی می‌کنم با او صحبت کنم، عصبانی می‌شود و فکر می‌کند من با او مثل یکی از مشتریانم صحبت می‌کنم.

من سعی می‌کنم، اما خیلی سخت است. او مشکلی با بازی‌های شرطی دارد و بیشتر مشتریان من همین مشکل را دارند.

من نیاز دارم که او را مجبور به رفتن کنم. امیدوارم که با من همکاری کند، شاید این باعث تغییر او شود.

As a child he was a Michael Jackson impersonator and put on performances.

Action games I think, I like those. Did you know Call of Duty was released six years ago? Crazy!
It seems so long ago doesn't it? Personally, I'd rather play race car games and maybe find a red car that matches my real one.

I enjoy racing. I might visit a national park later to have fun, what will you do later?
Which national park were you going to visit? I'll probably drive my red car to the beach later

Yellowstone probably, did you know it is considered the world's first national park? The beach seems like fun!
I didn't know that. What year was it founded?

I believe it was founded on March 1st 1872, it's way older than me.
Haha. I would hope so! I may need to visit that park soon. I hope you have a good time.

'take out is great ! do you like movies ?'

'It depends on the movie. Interestingly enough, I just heard a hip-hop song called  '

column3:
"Farming sounds interesting. But if you own your own farm there's no retirement fund and I'm super excitied for my upcoming retirement!"
"Retirement sounds like a nice way to just not work and relax forever, no need for employment, i also work in  a farm"

"Yes, that's very true. I can't wait for it. It'll let me spend time with my all of beautiful children that I love so much."
"yes indeed , it is a good thing , enjoy it a lot, i was born in kansas, do you know what that means"

"I've never been to Kansas myself. I've only heard of it through "The Wizard of Oz.""
"You should visit when you have a chance, it is a magic place,what do you think?"

"Maybe I'll check it out one day. I'm sure it would be unique."
"most definitely , along with the beautiful scenery, kansas is live, with a wide range of culture"

"Really? I've never heard anything about its culture."
"They are governed as an independent so their culture is very unique in that sense, but they are also very old and cultured"

"I'll have to do some research on this when I get out to the library."
"You should, it is worth a look! and the do a follow up by coming and visiting the place, you will love it"

کشاورزی جالب به نظر می‌رسد. اما اگر شما مزرعه خود را داشته باشید، صندوق بازنشستگی ندارید و من برای بازنشستگی آینده‌ام بسیار هیجان زده هستم!

بله، این خیلی درست است. من نمی‌توانم منتظر باشم. این به من اجازه می‌دهد که وقت خود را با همه فرزندان زیبایم که خیلی دوستشان دارم بگذرانم.

من خودم هرگز به کانزاس نرفته‌ام. تنها از آن از طریق "جادوگر از اوز" شنیده‌ام.

شاید یک روز بررسی کنم. مطمئنم که منحصر به فرد خواهد بود.

واقعا؟ هیچ وقت چیزی درباره فرهنگش نشنیده‌ام.

وقتی به کتابخانه برسم، باید کمی تحقیق کنم.
column5:
بازنشستگی به نظر می‌رسد یک راه خوب برای فقط کار نکردن و برای همیشه استراحت کردن است، نیازی به استخدام نیست، من هم در یک مزرعه کار می‌کنم.

بله، واقعاً، این چیز خوبی است، از آن لذت ببرید، من در کانزاس متولد شدم، آیا می دانید این چه معنی دارد؟

شما باید وقتی فرصت دارید بیایید، اینجا یک مکان جادویی است، چه فکر می‌کنید؟

بی شک، همراه با چشم انداز زیبا، کانزاس زنده است، با طیف گسترده‌ای از فرهنگ‌ها.

آنها به عنوان یک مستقل حاکم هستند، بنابراین فرهنگ آنها در این زمینه بسیار منحصر به فرد است، اما آنها همچنین بسیار قدیمی و فرهنگی هستند.

شما باید، ارزش دیدن دارد! و سپس با بازدید از مکان پیگیری کنید، شما آن را دوست خواهید داشت.

'Haha I really don't think so. His songs are lovely anyway'
'are you a fan of prince ? purple rain . . . purple rain . . .'

'Well yes I am, he was such an amazing singer. Do you like music?'
'I love music, mostly I only listen to Cindy Lauper.'

'That is an amazing singer too. When I bought my home, I listened to Prince all day for the first day haha'
"Wow, didn't you get bored of listening?"

"I could do that over again, it's quite easy for me. Do you own a home?"
"Not at the moment. I live near a road , so it's too dangerous to have one right now."

"Alright that's fair enough, any plans of maybe moving out and buying one?"
'not unless my career takes me there . we are settled for now .'

'I live in Virginia and I love it here. Where do you live?'
'I live in England, I want to move soon.'

The American Museum of Natural History in NYC. It was only temporary. It had been traveling around the world.
Do you like museums?
Yes, I love museums! I always love learning new things and seeing different things.

مطمئنا. شاید به یک انگیزه کوچک نیاز داری، نه لزوما یک رویداد غم‌انگیز مثل من.

"Yeah I got a warranty but it's so annoying, do you drive a car?"
"Yes, I couldn't live without my car.  I pick up my grandchildren from school each day, they are my world.  I couldn't do that without driving."

"Aww that sounds lovely, do you listen to music with them? Like Justin Bieber?"
"No they can't sit still long enough.  I listen to my headphones, I like oldies, like The Beatles."

"Cool, I'm listening to Olivia Newton-John right now! "
"I love her!  We like to be outdoors, walk to the lake near my house.  The kids love that.  Do you like being outside?"

"I do, I really enjoy going camping. Sometimes my family comes with me and we have a great time."
"That sounds nice!  Camping can be alot of fun.  Where do you camp?"

"We have some awesome parks here in England that I go to. Where are you from?"
"I was born and raised in Romeo, Michigan.  I am still there, I love it here.  I don't think I will ever leave."

"I don't think I've heard of it, I would love to travel to different places."
"You should come visit me!  I think you would like it.  There are also tons of campgrounds."

column3:
'It is a symbol for LGBT pride, but I am not sure how it came to be or what it represents for certain people'
"Interesting to have this discusssion today, as it is pride month where I live. There's a massive parade on Saturday that celebrates all kinds of sexuality."

'There might be here too, but I have to admit I don't follow personally. Only what I see on the news'
'well, the LGBT movements started in the early 20th century, so it definitely started becoming more socially accepted around then.'

'Unfortunately, the movement still has a long way to go. The small mindedness of some people is so upsetting.'
"Absolutely. Things have gotten so crazy that's it's almost pointless to engage others in objective discussion."

'I think people get in a certain mindset and are just too stubborn to try and see that they might be wrong. We are all stubborn in some sense'
'Yes and one of the most important statuses of a person is gender, it breaks my heart that people can be so close minded, especially parents.'

'How funny that you said that. My son literally came out to me 3 days ago. He had been scared of what I would say.'
"Oh, well just trust in the Son of God and you'll be saved"

'I trust in my religion, and I love my kid. I only feel for the rough path he might have ahead due to other people. I cant protect him forever.'
'i understand how it is , but you cannot hide who you are from god'
column4:
این یک نماد برای افتخار افراد LGBT است، اما من مطمئن نیستم که چگونه شکل گرفت یا چه معنایی برای افراد خاصی دارد.

ممکن است اینجا هم باشد، اما باید اعتراف کنم که شخصاً پیگیری نمی‌کنم. تنها آنچه را که در خبرها می‌بینم.

متاسفانه، این جنبش هنوز مسیر طولانی‌ای را پیش رو دارد. بی‌اندازه‌گرایی برخی افراد بسیار ناراحت‌کننده است.

فکر می‌کنم مردم در یک فکر خاص گیر می‌افتند و خیلی سرسخت هستند که سعی کنند ببینند که ممکن است اشتباه باشند. ما همه به نوعی سرسخت هستیم.

چقدر خنده دار که این رو گفتی. پسرم حدود ۳ روز پیش به من اعتراف کرد. او از اینکه من چه می‌گویم می‌ترسیده بود.

من به دین خود اعتماد دارم و فرزندم را دوست دارم. تنها نگران راه سختی هستم که ممکن است به دلیل دیگران پیش روی او باشد. نمی‌توانم همیشه او را حفاظت کنم.
column5:
جالب است که امروز این بحث را داشته باشیم، زیرا در محل زندگی من ماه افتخار است. یک پاراد بزرگ در روز شنبه برگزار می‌شود که همه انواع جنسیت را جشن می‌گیرد.

خب، جنبش‌های ال‌جی‌بی‌تی در اوایل قرن بیستم شروع شدند، بنابراین قطعاً از آن زمان به بعد شروع به پذیرش اجتماعی بیشتر کردند.

قطعا. اوضاع به اندازه دیوانه‌وار شده که تقریبا بی‌هوده است که با دیگران در گفتگوی منطقی مشغول شویم.

بله و یکی از مهم‌ترین وضعیت‌های یک فرد جنسیت است، این مرا ناراحت می‌کند که مردم می‌توانند به این اندازه ذهن بسته‌ای باشند، به ویژه والدین.

اوه، فقط به پسر خدا اعتماد کنید و نجات پیدا خواهید کرد.

من می‌فهمم چطور است، اما نمی‌توانی از خداوند که هستی خود را پنهان کنی.

'of course i go elsewhere. how about you?'
"I don't like travelling"

'ohh i see. i enjoy travelling.'
"I'm scared of flying"

'you ever been in a plane?'
"No, I don't like it. I'm always scared it's going to crash."

'Well you are not entirely wrong as your worries are valid, but you know the fun things of life are on the other side of fear. face your fear!'
"Hmmm, that sound like it. I'll give it a trial."

"You should. Airplanes are not that bad, actually the first time is always memorable, the raging emotions don't leave in a hurry."
'For real?.....Guess I should do one tomorrow. A local journey though. Thanks for the encouragment'

'Yes i am for real ! that sound like a plan. so brace yourself for some fun ride. *wink*'

من باور دارم معلمان باید بقدر بسیار بیشتری نسبت به حقوقی که دریافت می‌کنند، پرداخت شوند.

متاسفم فقط خودم را گرفتم. گاهی اوقات این کار را می‌کنم

شما باید به این فکر کنید که استاد شوید. این بزرگترین درآمدی دارد.

این بهتر از یک معلم مدرسه عمومی است. آن‌ها چیزی درآوردند.

معلمان همیشه این کار را انجام می‌دهند اما به نظر نمی‌رسد که کمک کند. دولت اهمیت می‌دهد.

بسیار درست است که فرزند من در یک مدرسه مسیحی خصوصی تحصیل می‌کند. مدارس عمومی چیزی به آن‌ها نمی‌آموزند.
column5:
دقیقاً همین حسی که من دارم. بعضی از معلمان به نظر می‌رسد فقط به پول علاقه دارند و ما همه می‌دانیم که معلمان کم حقوق هستند.

اشکال نداره، من فقط دومین سال دانشگاه هستم و امیدوارم که به عنوان یک معلم کار پیدا کنم.

واقعاً این چیزی است که من به دنبال انجام آن هستم، اما شنیده‌ام که حقوق و مزایای خوبی دارد!

همیشه فکر می‌کنم که بچه‌ها حق معلمان بهتر را دارند، بدون توجه به هیچ چیز. اگر معلم شوم، برای حقوق بهتر تلاش خواهم کرد!

و آن‌ها تعجب می‌کنند که چرا بیشتر کودکان امروزی نمی‌توانند چیزی به اندازه خواندن کلمات را انجام دهند. smh

column3:
"I've watched some foreign cartoons"
"You mean the Japanese cartoons that are quite colorful?"

"Some, but also lots of Italian cartoons."
"I'm not familiar with Italian cartoons, do you watch them on Youtube? "

"Some of them. I bootleg a lot."
"I do as well, hope I don't get caught!"

"A lot of older films and shows are in the public domain"
"How are they making money off what they are known for though if they give it away for free?"

"The mindset of the public domain is that the art is old enough its fallen out of copyright - usually several decades after the death of the creator. "
"That's cool, I didn't know that.  I like showing older stuff to my son, see if I can foster an appreciation for all forms of artwork. "

"The Internet Archive is a great resource. It catalogs a lot of things from the library of congress."
"Thanks, I'll have to check it out.  "

برای من، سرعت تغییرات، به ویژه فناوری، مهم است. می‌توانید آن را یاد بگیرید، اما تا زمانی که اطلاعات قدیمی شده است.

I can't think of anyone in particular. Techno is pretty much all I listen to, so my faves change. What kind of music do you like?

I like Techno music but I also like Classic Rock like ZZ Top and that sort.
Wicked, brother! Classic rock is classic, yes, indeed! What's your favorite classic rock artists?

Oh gosh...all of them...Van Halen, AC/DC, Aerosmith (although they weren't considered really rock back then) and of course ZZTop.
ac dc is awesome ! they have got so many great hits ! i have one of their band shirts from the 80s.

Really?  You ever think of selling it on Ebay?
Nah. My wardrobe is full of old band tees. I'd never think of selling them.

That's probably best because then you would definitely miss them.
You're totally correct. (:

I live in the country so I just turn it up and hope the dogs don't mind the noise...they don't :)

column3:
"I'm looking forward to going to summer camp."
"Have you ever been to summer camp before?"

"No, I'm only in the 3rd grade, so this will be new for me."
"I bet you will love it. What are you most looking forward to?"

"I'd like to make some new friends."
"I'm sure you will make new friends. I enjoy meeting new people!"

"I'll be playing soccer in the fall too."
"Soccer is fun! I play soccer, too. What position do you play?"

"At this point, we're all over the place."
"Got it. I play forward. Soccer will be a great way to meet new friends, too."

"That's what I was hoping. I'm new in the US and need more friends."
"Sports and summer camp will be perfect. What else do you do for fun?"

"It's kind of like therapy lol. So what do you do for a living?"
"I'm a landscaper. It's kind of rough work at times, but it's rewarding to see your vision come together, especially when you have to work with a big team."

"That sounds neat. How long have you been doing that? I'm currently unemployed but my husband works as a corporate attorney."
"about 6 years . give or take a little . very rewarding as far as people i meet ."

"I can imagine. I bet that keeps you really physically fit."
"yes it does ! and i am willing to work off the extra fat ."

"Haha I'm not much of a fan of exercising myself."
"fortunately , i got into great shape and that helped . what do you enjoy ?"

"I enjoy music and painting. What about you?"
"i love music also and football"

"Nice! I really need to go get my nails done. It's so relaxing."
"yes , definitely ! a good pedicure always helps me to unwind as well ."

column3:
My son is in dance and he gets bored with the strict repetition of moves. I can understand that. After many failed attempts, my oldest son gave up but then watched a youtube video and learned in about 15 minutes...
Learned what specifically?  How to Moonwalk?  I tried and failed miserably after watching a video on how to do it. He was trying to learn how to do the robot. He wanted to "move like that man on the street" as he put it. 
Oh how fun, we're so lucky we live in an age where Youtube and such exist.  For real! I was impressed by what you can find on the internet now a days.
Oh I love to shop online, the magic of the being able to buy anything and everything with just a few clicks is amazing. No joke! So many conveniences. But my favorite place to shop is at goodwill. Me and my son go there a lot.
I love Goodwill, you can find such awesome bargains.  I really should pay more attention to being environmentally friendly. They really do have lots of great things at thrift stores, even nice clothes. And sometimes you can fine clothing created from eco-friendly fabrics.
I really should pay more attention to being environmentally friendly. you should! it is a great benefit to your finances if you go green, like turning off your lights, using less water ect.
column4:
پسرم در رقص است و از تکرار سخت حرکات خسته می شود. من می توانم این را درک کنم. پس از تلاش های بسیار ناکام، پسر بزرگترم تسلیم شد اما سپس یک ویدیوی یوتیوب را تماشا کرد و در حدود ۱۵ دقیقه یاد گرفت...

اوه چقدر خوبه، چقدر خوش شانسیم که در یک دوران زندگی می‌کنیم که یوتیوب و موارد مشابه وجود دارند. واقعا! من تحت تاثیر قرار گرفتم از آنچه که می‌توانید در این روزها در اینترنت پیدا کنید.

من عاشق خیریه‌ی Goodwill هستم، می‌توانید معاملات فوق‌العاده‌ای پیدا کنید. واقعا بیشتر باید به محیط زیست دوستانه بودن توجه کنم. آنها واقعا چیزهای فوق‌العاده‌ای در فروشگاه‌های دست دوم دارند، حتی لباس‌های خوب. و گاهی اوقات می‌توانید لباس‌هایی از بافت‌های دوستانه با محیط زیست پیدا کنید.
column5:
چی یاد گرفتی؟ چطور مون‌واک کنی؟ من سعی کردم و بعد از تماشای ویدیویی که نشان می‌داد چطور انجام دهی، بی‌نتیجه ماندم. او داشت سعی می‌کرد یاد بگیرد چطور روبات شود. او می‌خواست "مثل آن مردی که در خیابان حرکت می‌کند" حرکت کند، همانطور که او گفت.

اوه، من عاشق خرید آنلاین هستم، جادوی اینکه با چند کلیک هر چیزی را خریداری کنید فوق‌العاده است. بدون شوخی! اینقدر امکانات زیادی وجود دارد. اما محل مورد علاقه‌ام برای خرید، فروشگاه خیریه است. من و پسرم اغلب به آنجا می‌رویم.

واقعا باید بیشتر به حفظ محیط زیست توجه کنم. تو هم باید! اگر به سبز زندگی کنی، مانند خاموش کردن چراغ ها، استفاده کمتر از آب و غیره، این برای مالیات شما بسیار مفید است.

I like to ride scooters. Do you have electric scooters where you live?
Yes! It's a cheap and quick way to get to the office and around town. I work in real estate so there's a good amount of short distance travel.

That's nice. Have you sold any houses lately?
I'm not exactly an agent, though I am responsible for listing and staging homes. Do you have any hobbies?

I like to paint. Do you like art?
I enjoy watching art. Maybe I'll hapen across some of it!

You should try pottery. It is fun and can relax you.
That sounds cool. My real passion is in singing, but it is just a hobby for now.

Do you ever do karaoke? I did it on vacation once. It was so embarrassing.
Only once at a wedding reception. I tried to do a CCR song. What did you sing?

Yeah, but I will give him another chance to have a relationship with me. I have a lot of friends, so I am happy anyway.

column3:
"that's great, children are those things that makes you feel welcomed when you got back from work"
Yup, I'm thinking about working at home depot with my dad soon.

"Oh that's a good idea, working in the family business brings family more closer to each other "
Home depot isn't really a "family business", but luckily for my dad his co-workers treat him like he's part of a family.

"oh that's okay, i thought it owned by your dad"
Nah it's fine, maybe with his knowledge about home depot I can start one.

"hmmm, you really have a good sense of humor, that's a great idea"
It wasn't really a joke, but maybe it is.

"No it wasn't"
Yeah, I was being serious about starting a business with my dads help. Just floating the idea.

"well i bet you it's a great idea, work it out. I bet you're going to enjoy it"
Thanks, the details are a bit sketchy now, but I'm sure it'll come to me with time.

"I hope so. I have two kids and my husband can't work. Do you have kids?"
"No I don't, I'm very busy with my career at an accounting firm."
"Oh that sounds difficult. Are you a CPA?"
"Yes, since i grew up as an only child, my parents really focused on me academically. I'm a whiz with numbers."
"That's great! I wish I was better at math. Finding admin work is hard with everyone else looking too."
"Yeah it's definitely a saturated market. Is there anything else you would want to do?"

"I'd love to be a teacher, but going back to school for a new degree just isn't possible right now."
"Have you thought about trying to be a substitute teacher?"
"That's a good idea! Do they need special training?"
"No, I think you just contact the school to see if you can be put on the list."
"That's true, and I really don't care. I just want to find a good job."
"I totally understand. Just keep trying and things will work out for you."

column3:
I think many people fail to notice how beautiful the art of video games can be. Indeed, Some games games are purposely designed to be a work of a persons creative expression, many though have been challenged as works of art by some critics.
Video games are undervalued by many and too easily blamed for problems like obesity or violence in kids. Indeed, Just last week my son was playing some Tine 2 and it was keeping him so calm. Games are therapeutic to some.
I use games to relax after a stressful day, the small escape is relaxing. I enjoy a good gaming session after a hard day at work as well.
What other hobbies does your son have? Well he likes to fly kites and collect bugs, typical hobbies for an 8 year old, lol.
My 12 year old is into sports. Football mostly. I however don;t enjoy watching him play. I wish I could play football, But I wear this cateye glasses and they would break if I tried.
Sounds nice. Are they new or vintage? They are new, I got them because of my love for cats lol. I have to show off my beautiful green eyes somehow.

I love the arts, do you have any specific recommendations about the arts attractions in London?
Ive been to London and I saw 2 broadway shows. One was called "Starlight Express" and it was amazing@
That sounds like fun, I'll check that out if I go! Do you have any pets?
Yes! I have a dog and 2 rabbits.
That's awesome! I have two dogs. I love animals, that's why I became a veterinary assistant.
Very cool. Do you treat a lot of rabbits where you work?
We do!  For the most part, it's cats and dogs, but we will treat any animal. We even have a skunk patient!
Oh wow. A skunk? That's crazy? Do they remove their scent glands or something?
Yes, and after that, they are similar to having a cat. They can even be litter box trained.
That's cool. What do they eat? I feed my rabbits all kinds of veggies.
They eat vegetables and also meat. Rabbits are so cute when they eat!
Yes. Have you ever had rabbit stew ? You could make it with carrots a bunnies favorite snack.

column3:
"I have, but it's so hard to do."
"I'm an accountant so I sit most of the day. I go to the gym just to be more active."

"I'm an artist, so as far from an accountant as you can get."
"Well at least you probably love what you do...I'm kind of jaded."

"I do love being an artist, being able to express my creativity and get paid for it is the dream."
"I don't know if I love anything...maybe I should tap into my artistic side."

"There's all kinds of tutorial videos for how to do anything you can think of, just start with something that sounds interesting."
"How about you teach me to paint and I'll train you at the gym. Or do your taxes or something haha."

"Sounds like a deal, I'm horrible at doing taxes."
"We can give each other more confidence where we need it."

"I like helping people release their creativity, we all have that inside of us, just have to tap into it."
"Yeah, accounting is only creative when it's illegal lol. I think losing some weight might give you more energy to create even more."
column4:
من دارم، اما انجام دادنش خیلی سخته.

من یک هنرمند هستم، پس از حسابداری دورترین چیزی هستم که می‌توانید فکر کنید.

من عاشق بودن یک هنرمند هستم، قادر به بیان خلاقیت خود و دریافت پول برای آن رویاست.

تمام انواع ویدیوهای آموزشی برای انجام هر کاری که به ذهنت می رسد وجود دارد، فقط با یک موضوع جالب شروع کنید.

صدای یک معامله می‌دهد، من واقعاً بد در انجام مالیات هستم.

من دوست دارم به مردم کمک کنم تا خلاقیت خود را آزاد کنند، همه ما این خلاقیت را درون خود داریم، فقط باید به آن دسترسی پیدا کنیم.
column5:
من حسابدار هستم، بنابراین بیشتر روز را نشسته می‌گذرانم. به باشگاه ورزشی می‌روم تا فعال‌تر باشم.

خب حداقل شما احتمالا از کاری که انجام می دهید لذت می برید... من کمی خسته شده ام.

من نمی‌دانم که آیا عاشق چیزی هستم یا نه...شاید به طرف هنری خود بروم.

چطوره اگه تو به من نقاشی یاد بدی و من تو را در باشگاه ورزشی آموزش بدم؟ یا مالیاتت رو انجام بدم یا چیزی مشابهش هاها.

ما می‌توانیم به یکدیگر اعتماد بیشتری بدهیم جایی که نیاز داریم.

"آره، حسابداری فقط زمانی خلاق است که غیرقانونی باشد هاها. فکر می‌کنم کمی وزن کم کردن می‌تواند به شما انرژی بیشتری بدهد تا حتی بیشتر خلاقیت داشته باشید."

column3:
"I'm being Zelda for Halloween this year, I can't wait."
"Zelda is one of my favorites ! It was published by Nintendo great action, adventure game !"

"I game a lot, do you play video games? "
"I play online games.  What do you play?"

"A little of everything, FPS, action, adventure, puzzle, RPG, I just love gaming. "
"I like to play yahtzee online with people I know.  What is your favorite game?"

"I used to play yahtzee with my dad, brings back good memories.  I don't know if I have a favorite, it really depends on my mood. "
"Yeah I love the game!  My grandmother played it a lot with all the grand kids"

"It's awesome how games can bring people together, although sometimes serious competition can occur. "
"Very true.  Somebody has to win!"

"I think playing games with kids is really beneficial cause it teaches them that concept, there has to be winners and losers, can't always be the winner. "
"My daughter loves to play her Nintendo Switch and can be a sore loser sometimes.  I think we all can."

کمی از همه چیز، بازی‌های اکشن، ماجراجویی، پازل، نقش‌آفرینی، من فقط عاشق بازی کردن هستم.

column3:
He was an amazing man but he died two years ago.
"I'm sorry to here that. I bet you miss him. How'd he die?"

He had Alzheimer's disease for 6 years and died when he was 82.
"oh wow, very sorry to hear that. Alzheimer's has often been referred to as the longest death. I hope you're doing ok now."

Yes, it's been two years so I am doing better.  Thank you!  He was a farmer and very hardworking when he was younger.
That sounds like a lovely life to have led. We need more farmers these days. Hate to lose any.

He taught me to be independent and successful in any job I've had.
That is very respectable. I admire people that want to help others maintain a quality life. Sounds like he was a great teacher.

He was.  Tell me about your father.
He's great. He had to slow down after a health scare recently, but he taught me my love of clay and is an artist himself.

I bet you both are great artists!  I have no artistic talent whatsoever.
oh you don't need talent to play with clay ! practice, practice, practice makes the difference. My first sculpture was a tomato'ish thing.

It was really nice talking to you!
same to you ! it was a pleasure.
column4:
او مردی فوق‌العاده بود اما دو سال پیش درگذشت.

او برای ۶ سال بیماری آلزایمر داشت و در سن ۸۲ سالگی درگذشت.

بله، دو سال شده پس حالا بهترم. ممنون! او یک کشاورز بود و وقتی جوان بود بسیار سخت کوش بود.

او به من آموخت که مستقل و موفق در هر شغلی که داشته‌ام باشم.

او بود. درباره پدرت به من بگوید.

من حتما می‌گذارم که هر دو شما هنرمندان بزرگی هستید! من هیچ استعداد هنری ندارم.

با شما صحبت کردن واقعاً لذت بخش بود!
column5:
متاسفم که اینو شنیدم. حتما ازش دلتون برایش تنگ شده. چطور مرد؟

"اوه واو، بسیار متاسف شدم که این را شنیدم. آلزایمر اغلب به عنوان طولانی‌ترین مرگ شناخته شده است. امیدوارم الان حالت خوب باشد."

این به نظر یک زندگی دلپذیر به نظر می رسد. این روزها نیاز به بیشتر کشاورزان داریم. نمی خواهیم هیچ کس را از دست بدهیم.

این بسیار قابل احترام است. من از افرادی که می‌خواهند به دیگران کمک کنند تا یک زندگی با کیفیت داشته باشند، تحسین می‌کنم. به نظر می‌رسد او یک معلم عالی بوده است.

او عالی است. او باید پس از یک ترس سلامتی اخیر کمی کند کرد، اما به من عشق من به خاک را آموخت و خود هنرمند است.

column3:
"Yes, it's been very hard.  Do you have any hobbies?"
"unfortunately i don't have much time for hobbies . what about you ?"

I do like to go to the movies when I have time.
"that is awesome ! yes i love movies . what kind do you prefer ?"

I like comedies the best.  My parents would take my brother and I when we were young but to see animated ones.
'Your parents sound like wonderful people!'

Thank you.  I do have good memories to remember.
"It's great to have such good family support."

"It really is.  I know that's how i'll get through this."
'That hope and optimism will take you far in life.'

Yes, hopefully it will.
'i will keep my fingers crossed for you .'
column4:
بله، خیلی سخت بوده است. آیا شما هر سرگرمی خاصی دارید؟

من وقتی وقت دارم، دوست دارم به سینما بروم.

من کمدی ها را بهترین می‌پسندم. والدینم همیشه ما را وقتی که کوچک بودیم برای دیدن انیمیشن ها می‌بردند.

متشکرم. من خاطرات خوبی برای یادآوری دارم.

این واقعاً چنین است. من می دانم که اینطوری می توانم از این موقعیت عبور کنم.

بله، امیدوارم که این اتفاق بیفتد.
column5:
متاسفانه من وقت زیادی برای سرگرمی‌ها ندارم. شما چطور؟

این عالیه! بله من عاشق فیلم هستم. چه نوع فیلمی را ترجیح می دهید؟

والدین شما به نظر می‌رسند افراد فوق‌العاده‌ای باشند!

خوبه که حمایت خانوادگی خوبی داریم.

آن امید و امیدواری شما را در زندگی به دورترین نقطه هدایت خواهد کرد.

من انگشتانم را برای شما چشم می‌کنم.

column3:
'Wow, you know a lot about him. I like ed sheeran too actually'
"Awesome at least you like good music too. I'm trying to make a name for myself in baseball"

'Wow baseball? Do you play professionally?'
'This is my second year in the league. Hope to move to the major'

"Wow, good luck! I'm rooting for you. Which team do you play for?"
"Its called St. Louis Potatos Skin......Don't laugh"

"HAHA! I'm sorry, but that's kind of funny. I actually teach yoga"
'i tried yoga once . . . everything hurt but I felt good when it stopped'

'yes, i hear that a lot. You will get better with practice.'
'I plan to start again figure it would be good with my baseball'

"Yes, you're right. Hopefully it will help with preventing injuries."
'Yes I think it will and thank you for the encouragement! :)'
column4:
'واو، تو خیلی اطلاعات درباره او داری. من واقعا هم اد شیرن را دوست دارم'

"واو بیسبال؟ آیا حرفه ای بازی می کنید؟"

"واو، موفق باشید! من برای شما تمنا می‌کنم. برای کدام تیم بازی می‌کنید؟"

ههه! متاسفم، اما این کمی خنده دار است. من واقعاً یوگا تدریس می‌کنم.

بله، من این را بسیار می‌شنوم. با تمرین بهتر خواهید شد.

بله، درست می‌گویید. امیدوارم که با جلوگیری از آسیب‌ها کمک کند.
column5:
عالی، حداقل تو هم موسیقی خوب رو دوست داری. من دارم سعی می‌کنم تو بیسبال شهرت کسب کنم.

این دومین سال من در لیگ است. امیدوارم به لیگ اصلی بروم.

این به نام پوست سیب زمینی سنت لوئیس است......خندیدن نکنید

من یک بار یوگا را امتحان کردم . . . همه چیز درد می‌کرد اما وقتی متوقف شد خوب احساس کردم

من قصد دارم دوباره شروع کنم و فکر می‌کنم که با بیسبال من خوب خواهد بود.

بله، فکر می‌کنم این اتفاق خواهد افتاد و از تشویق شما متشکرم! :)
